Exaggerate: The claim of cutting taxes 23 times may be an exaggeration as it is disputed whether all the tax cuts can be credited to Giuliani.
Falters at times: Giuliani's claim falters because he was opposed to one of the tax cuts he lists and several other cuts were championed by others or involved state funds.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is disputed whether Giuliani can take credit for all the tax cuts he claims.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that some of the tax cuts should be credited to state government initiatives rather than Giuliani's actions.
